Episode.EpisodeName: The Spirit of Christmas (Jesus vs. Santa)
Episode.Overview: Used as a Christmas card by a Fox executive, this short brought South Park to the attention of Comedy Central. Jesus arrives in South Park and accuses Santa of blasphemy at the local mall. Santa challenges him to a fight and the violence between the two quickly escalates. Even Brian Boitano can't help the boys who have found themselves in the middle of this fight.
